raw_text: Existing work in abstractive summarization has been quite limited and can becategorized into two categories: (1) approaches using prior knowledge (Radev and McKeown, 1998) (Finley and Harabagiu, 2002) (DeJong, 1982) and (2) approaches using Natural Language Generation (NLG) systems (Saggion and Lapalme, 2002) (Jing and McKeown, 2000)
